text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/vr-common-library/CodeSystem/CodeSystem-transax-conversion-vr defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
3 Conversion using non-ambivalent table entriesConversion using non-ambivalent table entries
4 Conversion using ambivalent table entriesConversion using ambivalent table entries
5 Duplicate entity-axis codes deleted; no other action involvedDuplicate entity-axis codes deleted; no other action involved
6 Artificial code conversion; no other actionArtificial code conversion; no other action

name: CodeSystemTransaxConversionVitalRecords
title: CodeSystem - Transax Conversion Vital Records
description: This CodeSystem contains codes representing transax conversions.
